plot: Monroe (Silas Weir Mitchell) fights an impossible battle to convince his parents (guest stars Dee Wallace and Chris Mulkey) to embrace the life choices he's made. Meanwhile, Nick (David Giuntoli) turns to Juliette (Bitsie Tulloch) to help him figure out the Wesen aspect of his cop-killing scalper investigation. On the Royal Baby front, Captain Renard (Sasha Roiz) learns new information that forces him to contact Adalind (Claire Coffee) in the interest of keeping her and the baby safe from Viktor (guest star Alexis Denisof).—Anonymous

Nick's team realizes the feral authoritative 'warriors'-scalpers belong to a nearly invincible ancient tradition whose only weak spot is Samson-like and check out new victims. In Austria, Meisner and Sebastien help Adalind escape from prince Victor, who suspects gypsy Stefania, while the royal baby's magic kicks in spontaneously. Monroe confronts his parents, but his father Bart won't consider inter-feral-species relationships, considering a Grimm friend even worse then the bribe, yet his wife Alice wants her son back and Bart surprises helpfully.—KGF Vissers
